sentences.en: "The potential for disaster is enormous," he says.
He had enormous charm and a great sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 他极富魅力而且非常有幽默感。

sentences.en: She gets enormous pleasure out of working freelance.
sentences.cn: 做自由职业者让她体会到无穷的快乐。

sentences.en: She swathed her enormous body in thin black fabrics.
sentences.cn: 她用薄薄的黑色织物裹住了自己硕大的身躯。

sentences.en: The airlines have invested enormous sums in new, quieter aircraft.
sentences.cn: 航空公司投入了大笔资金购买噪音较小的新型飞机。

sentences.en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentences.cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

sentences.en: The company was coasting on the enormous success of its early products.
sentences.cn: 公司凭借早期产品的巨大成功而在市场上遥遥领先。

sentences.en: The country has made enormous strides politically but not economically.
sentences.cn: 该国在政治上取得了巨大的发展，但经济却跟不上去。

sentences.en: The domino effect if one train is cancelled is enormous.
sentences.cn: 如果一班火车被取消，其连锁反应将是巨大的。

sentences.en: The political pressures to do something are pretty enormous.
sentences.cn: 要求采取行动的政治压力非常巨大。

sentences.en: The repulsive force within the nucleus is enormous.
sentences.cn: 核子内部的斥力是巨大的。

sentences.en: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.cn: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

sentences.en: The two firms wield enormous clout in financial markets.
sentences.cn: 两家公司在金融市场有非常大的影响力。

sentences.en: There is an enormous sense of mission in his speech and gesture.
sentences.cn: 他的一言一行都带着强烈的使命感。

sentences.en: Turkeys can reach enormous weights of up to 50 pounds.
We'd taken enormous care in choosing the location.
sentences.cn: 在地点的选择上我们格外谨慎。

words.tran_cn: 巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上

trans.tran_en: very big in size or in amount
